articles.title: 'They should not be kept as pets': Foundation calls for castration, sterilisation of pit bulls - News24
articles.description: A foundation is calling on the South African government to castrate all male pit bulls and sterilise all females to prevent the future existence of the 'vicious' dog breed.
articles.content:
